content:
Hello Dear FHIR #Announcements professionals! I am Junaid Ahmad MBA-HR. As part of my research assignment, I created this form. It will take about 5 minutes to complete this survey. Feel free to answer the best of your knowledge.
Note: Your responses will be used only for research purposes. Here's the URL to submit a survey regarding FHIR.
https://forms.gle/taZTrAsgjrnFVz4s6

Hello Dear FHIR #Announcements professionals! I am Junaid Ahmad MBA-HR. As part of my research assignment, I created this form. It will take about 5 minutes to complete this survey. Feel free to answer the best of your knowledge.
Note: Your responses will be used only for research purposes. Here's the URL to submit a survey regarding FHIR.
https://forms.gle/taZTrAsgjrnFVz4s6

Hi Junaid -

The announcements section is for official announcements about FHIR and about this chat board. Your request should probably be posted in the #social stream.

Also I see that you posted it twice, after the first one got no responses. Please before re-posting anything, check to see if it already exists.

I'm looking for a few developers with experience in using Non-FHIR integration solutions to answer questions about a survey for ONC, there's even a teeny honorarium $$ involved. Could you please contact me here or matthew@matthewholt.net if you're inerested? Thanks
Hi Matthew Holt, you may want to try the #social stream for this - the Announcement stream is for official FHIR-related announcements.
@Vassil Peytchev and all, we probably should rename this stream Official Announcements! :slight_smile:
